https://www.voachinese.com/a/massive-protests-raise-fears-of-new-virus-outbreaks-20200531/5442941.html
Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms's message to the demonstrators Saturday night was the most cautionary. "If you went out last night to protest, you might need to do the Novel Coronavirus test this week," she said. She warned that the United States still had the novel Coronavirus epidemic, in which more black and coloured people were dying.
